DataElement.preferredName: Persistent Or Recurrence Disease Within Nine Month Last Dose BCG Regimen Occurrence Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date on which there is an occurrence of a persistent or recurrence disease within nine months of the lase dose of BCG regimen.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Persistent Or Recurrence Disease or Disorder Within Nine Month Last Dose BCG Regimen Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Retained; never-ceasing._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._To come back or to return._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:On the inside; contained in._A natural number greater than 8 and less than 10 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of nine and one._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._An immunotherapy regimen consisting of Bacillus Calmette-Guerin (BCG) that may be used in the treatment of bladder cancer._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Persistent Or Recurrence Disease or Disorder
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Retained; never-ceasing._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._To come back or to return._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Concepts.definition: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredName: Within Nine Month Last Dose BCG Regimen Occurrence
Property.preferredDefinition: On the inside; contained in.:A natural number greater than 8 and less than 10 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of nine and one.:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.:An immunotherapy regimen consisting of Bacillus Calmette-Guerin (BCG) that may be used in the treatment of bladder cancer.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 8 and less than 10 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of nine and one.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
An immunotherapy regimen consisting of Bacillus Calmette-Guerin (BCG) that may be used in the treatment of bladder cancer.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
